summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PMS (Project Management System) for construction activities. Backend APIs are 95.5% functional with excellent frontend integration. Login, dashboard, project management, user management, and all core features working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Progress log creation expects query parameters instead of form data
minor_bugs.impact: Progress log creation fails with 422 error
minor_bugs.details: API expects project_id, notes as query params but receives form data

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with correct stats cards (Total Projects, Budget, Pending Approvals, Overdue Tasks)
User management - create and list users
Task management - create and list tasks
Dashboard UI with proper red color scheme and white background
Navigation sidebar with all menu items
